introduction: I’m passionate about software development and web design, and I started learning through online videos. I enjoy working with JavaScript, Angular, and Git because I like solving problems and growing professionally. I prefer teamwork since it helps me learn from others. My motivation comes from enjoying the learning process, creating my own projects, and building a career in IT.

join-info: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
pokedex-info: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
game-info: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer Chicken.
